cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 12th Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 12th Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Our 8 Bed Mixed Dorm with Shared Bathroom (Ages 18-40yrs Only) features:

*  Air conditioning and heating to ensure a comfortable stay
*  Comfy linen provided
*  Free lockers
*  Fast, free WiFi

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Single Private Ensuite
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription:
Our Single Ensuite Rooms feature:


*  All linen, including towels
*  Airconditioning & Heating 
*  Daily housekeeping service
*  Free Wi-Fi access 
Please note: No additional amenities are included such as shampoo & room has no TV.
